## rows() function

Returns a table's rows as a two-dimensional array.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function rows(table: ColumnTable, options?: RowsOptions): any[][];
```

|  options | [RowsOptions](./tables.rowsoptions.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> |
